definition: lit. to want to get fat with only one mouthful (proverb)/fig. to try to achieve one's goal in the shortest time possible/to be impatient for success
pinyin: yi1 kou3 chi1 ge5 pang4 zi5

definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
variant of 吃[chi1]
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
variant of 個|个[ge4]
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
healthy/at ease
fat/plump
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success/impatient for result/impetuous
lit. to want sth in haste, but cannot get there (idiom, from Analects); more haste, less speed/don't try to run before you can walk
seeking instant benefit (idiom); shortsighted vision, looking only for fast return
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
to act with undue haste (idiom); eager and impatient/overhasty
lit. to want sth in haste, but cannot get there (idiom, from Analects); more haste, less speed/also written 欲速則不達|欲速则不达
reaching heaven in a single bound (idiom); (esp. with negative: don't expect) instant success
in sequence, step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally
lit. to fish for three days and sun-dry the nets for two days (proverb)/fig. not to persevere in doing sth/to do sth by fits and starts
pinyin: san1 tian1 da3 yu2 , liang3 tian1 shai4 wang3

definition: to spoil things through excessive enthusiasm (idiom)
take your time/take it easy
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
hasty men don't get to eat hot tofu (idiom)/one just has to be patient/haste will ruin everything
pinyin: xin1 ji2 chi1 bu5 liao3 re4 dou4 fu5

definition: to have high standards but little ability/to be fastidious but incompetent (idiom)
to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished
